00048 TScene::~TScene()
00049 {
00050     Destroy(true);
00051     //delete font
00052     glDeleteLists(m_font2D, 256);
00053     //delete buffers
00054     GLuint to_delete[] = { m_screen_quad, m_progress_bar };
00055     glDeleteBuffers(2, to_delete);
00056     /*
00057     materials.clear();
00058     m_objects.clear();
00059     m_lights.clear();
00060     */
00061 //    delete [] select_buffer;
00062 
00063     //free all objects, materials, textures...
00064     for(m_im = m_materials.begin(); m_im != m_materials.end(); m_im++)
00065         delete m_im->second;
00066     for(m_io = m_objects.begin(); m_io != m_objects.end(); m_io++)
00067         delete m_io->second;
00068     for(m_il = m_lights.begin(); m_il != m_lights.end(); m_il++)
00069         delete *m_il;
00070 
00071     delete m_font2D_tex;
00072     delete m_font2D_bkg;
00073 
00074     delete m_cam;
00075 }

00092 bool TScene::PreInit(GLint resx, GLint resy, GLfloat _near, GLfloat _far, GLfloat fovy, 
00093                      int msamples, bool cust_cam, bool load_font)
00094 {
00095     m_resx = resx;
00096     m_resy = resy;
00097     m_near_p = _near;
00098     m_far_p = _far;
00099     m_fovy = fovy;
00100     m_custom_cam = cust_cam;
00101     m_msamples = msamples;
00102     if(msamples < 1) msamples = 1;              //don't accept 0 for multisample count
00103 
00104     glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 4);      // 4-byte pixel alignment
00105     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5); //clear color and depth
00106     glClearDepth(1.0);
00107     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);          //enable depth buffer
00108     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00109     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_SEAMLESS);
00110     glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00111 
00112     //create initial scene size
00113     Resize(resx,resy);
00114 
00115     //initialize font
00116     if(load_font)
00117         BuildFont();
00118 
00119     //progress bar and background
00120     glGenBuffers(1, &m_progress_bar);
00121     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_progress_bar);
00122     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 8 * sizeof(GLfloat), NULL, GL_STREAM_DRAW); 
00123     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
00124 
00125     AddMaterial("mat_progress_bar", white, white, white, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, SCREEN_SPACE);
00126     AddTexture("mat_progress_bar","../data/load.tga");
00127     CustomShader("mat_progress_bar","../data/shaders/quad.vert", "../data/shaders/progress_bar.frag");
00128 
00129     return true;
00130 }

00140 bool TScene::PostInit()
00141 {
00142     //Generate uniform buffers 
00143     
00144     //for projection and shadow matrices
00145     glGenBuffers(1, &m_uniform_matrices);
00146     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_matrices);
00147     glBufferData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, (m_shadow_textures + 1) * sizeof(glm::mat4), NULL, GL_STREAM_DRAW);
00148         //attach uniform buffer and associate uniform block to this name
00149         glBindBufferBase(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, UNIFORM_MATRICES, m_uniform_matrices);
00150 
00151     //for lights
00152     unsigned light_count = m_lights.size();
00153     if(light_count == 0)
00154     {
00155         ShowMessage("There must be at least one light in the scene. Exiting.");
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158     glGenBuffers(1, &m_uniform_lights);
00159     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_lights);
00160     //buffer size: 4x vec3 values + 1x float value multiplied by lights count; 1 vec3 value
00161     glBufferData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, light_count * /*(4 * sizeof(glm::vec3) + sizeof(float)) + sizeof(glm::vec3)*/ 6 * align, NULL, GL_STREAM_DRAW);
00162         //attach uniform buffer and associate uniform block to this name
00163         glBindBufferBase(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, UNIFORM_LIGHTS, m_uniform_lights);
00164 
00165     //do we have shadows from lights?
00166     int i;
00167     for(i = 0, m_il = m_lights.begin(); m_il != m_lights.end(); ++m_il, i++)
00168     {
00169         if((*m_il)->HasShadow()) //if yes, create shadow map for current light
00170         {
00171             if(!CreateShadowMap(m_il))
00172                 return false;
00173 
00174             //add shadow map to all materials (except those who don't receive shadows)
00175             for(m_im = m_materials.begin(); m_im != m_materials.end(); ++m_im)
00176                 if(m_im->second->GetSceneID() == m_sceneID && !m_im->second->IsScreenSpace())
00177                     m_im->second->AddShadowMap((*m_il)->GetType(), *(*m_il)->GetShadowTexID(), (*m_il)->ShadowIntensity() );
00178 
00179             CreateDataTexture("select_texture", Z_SELECT_SIZE, Z_SELECT_SIZE, GL_RGBA16F, GL_FLOAT);
00180             //create render target for depth calculations
00181             glGenFramebuffers(1, &m_f_buffer_select);
00182             glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, m_f_buffer_select);
00183             //attach texture to the frame buffer
00184             glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_tex_cache["select_texture"], 0);
00185             glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0);
00186             //add shader for selecting depth values (IPSM only)
00187             if((*m_il)->GetType() == OMNI)
00188             {
00189                 AddMaterial("mat_depth_select",white,white,white,0.0,0.0,0.0,SCREEN_SPACE);
00190                 AddTexture("mat_depth_select", "normal_texture", RENDER_TEXTURE);
00191                 CustomShader("mat_depth_select","../data/shaders/quad.vert", "../data/shaders/select_depth.frag");
00192                 SetUniform("mat_depth_select","near_far",glm::vec2(m_near_p, m_far_p));
00193 
00194                 //allocate z-selection buffer
00195                 m_select_buffer = new float[Z_SELECT_SIZE*Z_SELECT_SIZE];
00196             }
00197         }
00198 
00199         //fill uniform block with light settings. Be careful to offsets!!!
00200         int offset = light_count * align;
00201         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, offset + i*align, sizeof(glm::vec3), glm::value_ptr((*m_il)->GetColor(AMBIENT)));   //ambient
00202         offset += light_count * align;
00203         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, offset + i*align, sizeof(glm::vec3), glm::value_ptr((*m_il)->GetColor(DIFFUSE)));   //diffuse
00204         offset += light_count * align;
00205         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, offset + i*align, sizeof(glm::vec3), glm::value_ptr((*m_il)->GetColor(SPECULAR)));   //specular
00206         offset += light_count * align;
00207         GLfloat radius = (*m_il)->GetRadius();
00208         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, offset + i*align, sizeof(float), &radius);   //radius
00209     }
00210 
00211     cout<<"Baking materials...\n";
00212     //assign light count to all materials and then bake them
00213     for(m_im = m_materials.begin(); m_im != m_materials.end(); ++m_im)
00214     {
00215         if(m_im->second->GetSceneID() == m_sceneID)
00216         {
00217             //set MRT if we use rendering to normal buffer
00218             if(m_useNormalBuffer)
00219                 m_im->second->UseMRT(true);
00220             //bake material
00221             m_im->second->BakeMaterial(m_lights.size());
00222             LoadScreen();
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226     //add screen quad for render targets
00227     AddScreenQuad();
00228 
00229     //add shadow shader when shadows are enabled (will be sending depth values only)
00230     AddMaterial("_mat_default_shadow");
00231     CustomShader("_mat_default_shadow", "../data/shaders/shadow.vert", "../data/shaders/shadow.frag");
00232 
00233     //and also for omnidirectional lights with dual-paraboloid
00234     AddMaterial("_mat_default_shadow_omni");
00235     CustomShader("_mat_default_shadow_omni", "../data/shaders/shadow_omni.vert", "../data/shaders/shadow_omni.frag");
00236 
00237     //optionally, add tessellation for paraboloid projection
00238     if(m_dpshadow_tess)
00239     {        
00240         TShader vert("../data/shaders/shadow_omni_tess.vert", "");
00241         TShader tcon("../data/shaders/shadow_omni_tess.tc", "");
00242         TShader teval("../data/shaders/shadow_omni_tess.te", "");
00243         TShader frag("../data/shaders/shadow_omni_tess.frag", "");
00244 
00245         AddMaterial("_mat_default_shadow_omni_tess", white, white, white, 64.0, 0.0, 0.0, NONE);
00246         CustomShader("_mat_default_shadow_omni_tess", &vert, &tcon, &teval, NULL, &frag);
00247     }
00248 
00249 
00250     //update uniform buffer with projection matrix and camera position
00251     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_matrices);
00252     glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(glm::mat4), glm::value_ptr(m_projMatrix));
00253     UpdateCameraUniform();
00254 
00255     cout<<"Post Init OK\n";
00256     return true;
00257 }

00266 void TScene::Resize(GLint resx, GLint resy)
00267 {
00268     m_resx = resx;
00269     m_resy = resy;
00270     glViewport(0,0,resx,resy);        //new viewport settings
00271     m_projMatrix = glm::perspective(m_fovy,(GLfloat)resx/resy,m_near_p,m_far_p);
00272 }

00282 void TScene::Destroy(bool delete_cache)
00283 {
00284     m_objects.clear();
00285     m_materials.clear();
00286     m_lights.clear();
00287 
00288     if(delete_cache)
00289     {
00290         //delete textures from cache
00291         for(m_it = m_tex_cache.begin(); m_it != m_tex_cache.end(); ++m_it)
00292             glDeleteTextures(1, &m_it->second);
00293         
00294         m_tex_cache.clear();
00295         m_obj_cache.clear();
00296     }
00297 
00298     //delete framebuffers
00299     if(m_useHDR || m_useSSAO)
00300     {
00301         glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_f_bufferAA);
00302         glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_r_bufferAA);
00303     }
00304 
00305     //reset camera
00306     m_cam->Reset();
00307     //delete buffers
00308     GLuint to_delete[] = { m_screen_quad, m_progress_bar, m_uniform_matrices, m_uniform_lights };
00309     glDeleteBuffers(4, to_delete);
00310 }

00329 void TScene::AddTexture(const char *name, const char *file, GLint textype, GLint texmode,
00330                         GLfloat intensity, GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool mipmap, bool aniso)
00331 {
00332     //material existence control
00333     if(m_materials.find(name) == m_materials.end())
00334     {
00335         cerr<<"WARNING (AddTexture): no material with name "<<name<<"\n";
00336         return;
00337     }
00339     m_it = m_tex_cache.find(file);
00340     GLint cache;
00342     if( m_it == m_tex_cache.end() )
00343         cache = -1;
00345     else
00346         cache = m_it->second;
00348     int texID;
00349     if( (texID = m_materials[name]->AddTexture(file,textype,texmode,intensity,tileX,tileY,mipmap,aniso,cache)) == ERR)
00350         throw ERR;
00351     else
00352         m_tex_cache[file] = texID;
00353     //LoadScreen();     //update loading screen
00354 }

00370 void TScene::AddTexture(const char *name, const char **files, GLint textype, GLint texmode,
00371                         GLfloat intensity, GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool aniso)
00372 {
00373     //material existence control
00374     if(m_materials.find(name) == m_materials.end())
00375     {
00376         cerr<<"WARNING (AddTexture): no material with name "<<name<<"\n";
00377         return;
00378     }
00379 
00380     //find out, if texture hasn't been loaded yet
00381     m_it = m_tex_cache.find(files[0]);
00382     GLint cache;
00384     if( m_it == m_tex_cache.end() )
00385         cache = -1;
00387     else
00388         cache = m_it->second;
00390     int texID;
00391     if( (texID = m_materials[name]->AddTexture(files,textype,texmode,intensity,tileX,tileY,aniso,cache)) == ERR)
00392         throw ERR;
00393     m_tex_cache[files[0]] = texID;
00394     //LoadScreen();     //update loading screen
00395 }

00403 void TScene::SetMaterial(const char* obj_name, const char *mat_name)
00404 {
00405     //object existence control
00406     if(m_objects.find(obj_name) == m_objects.end())
00407     {
00408         cerr<<"WARNING (SetMaterial): no object with name "<<obj_name<<"\n";
00409         return;
00410     }
00411     //material existence control
00412     if(m_materials.find(mat_name) == m_materials.end())
00413     {
00414         cerr<<"WARNING (SetMaterial): no object with name "<<mat_name<<"\n";
00415         return;
00416     }
00417     m_objects[obj_name]->SetMaterial(m_materials[mat_name]->GetID());
00418 }

00427 void TScene::AddObject(const char *name, const char* file)
00428 {
00430     TObject *o = new TObject();
00431     m_objects[name] = o;
00432 
00434     m_iob = m_obj_cache.find(file);
00435 
00437     if( m_iob == m_obj_cache.end() )
00438     {
00439         VBO vbo_ret = m_objects[name]->Create(name,file,true);
00440         if(vbo_ret.vao == 0)
00441             throw ERR;
00442         m_obj_cache[file] = vbo_ret;
00443     }
00445     else
00446     {
00447         m_objects[name]->SetVBOdata(m_iob->second);   //must be called before create!
00448         m_objects[name]->Create(name,file,false);
00449     }
00450     LoadScreen();       //update loading screen
00451     //set sceneID
00452     m_objects[name]->SetSceneID(m_sceneID);
00453 }

00466 void TScene::AddLight(GLint _lights, glm::vec3 amb, glm::vec3 diff, glm::vec3 spec, glm::vec3 lpos, GLfloat radius)
00467 { 
00468     //object for light
00469     string m_name = "default_light_" + num2str(m_lights.size());
00470     AddMaterial(m_name.c_str(), 2.0f*diff, 2.0f*diff, 2.0f*diff, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00471     AddObject(m_name.c_str(), "../data/obj/light.3ds");
00472     SetMaterial(m_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00473     CastShadow(m_name.c_str(), false);
00474     ReceiveShadow(m_name.c_str(), false);
00475     //create new and push into list
00476     TLight *l = new TLight(_lights, amb, diff, spec, lpos, radius);
00477     m_lights.push_back(l); 
00478     //update position
00479     MoveLight(_lights, lpos);
00480 }

00489 void TScene::MoveLight(GLint light, glm::vec3 w)
00490 {
00491     if(light < 0 || (unsigned)light > m_lights.size()) 
00492         cerr<<"WARNING: no light with index "<<light<<"\n";
00493     else 
00494     {
00495         m_lights[light]->Move(w);
00496         string l_name = "default_light_" + num2str(light);
00497         //update light position
00498         MoveObjAbs(l_name.c_str(), w.x, w.y, w.z);
00499         m_materials[l_name.c_str()]->SetUniform("in_ModelViewMatrix",m_viewMatrix * m_objects[l_name.c_str()]->GetMatrix());
00500         //update uniform buffer
00501         glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_lights);
00502         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, light*align, sizeof(glm::vec3), glm::value_ptr(glm::vec3(m_viewMatrix * glm::vec4(w, 1.0)))); 
00503     }
00504 }
00505 
00513 void TScene::ChangeLightColor(GLint light, GLint component, glm::vec3 color)
00514 {
00515     if(light < 0 || (unsigned)light > m_lights.size()) 
00516         cerr<<"WARNING: no light with index "<<light<<"\n";
00517     else 
00518     {
00519         m_lights[light]->ChangeColor(component,color);
00520         //update uniform buffer
00521         int offset1 = m_lights.size()*align;
00522         int offset2 = light*align;
00523         glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_lights);
00524         glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, component*offset1 + offset2, sizeof(glm::vec3), glm::value_ptr(color)); 
00525     }
00526 }
